basic_info.description: Hi! I'm Malik Sadiki-Torres, I'm native New Yorker with a passion for cooking and learning about new cultures. I studied History and Economics at Ithaca College, where I learned how to form critical arguements and conduct high level research. My professional background is in Client Success and Marketing. After having the opportunity to pilot a software engineering rotational program at my last company and enjoying every minite of it I decided to pursure software development fulltime. This led me to enroll in Code Fellows and specialize in fullstack javascript.

projects.title: Gallery of Horns
projects.description: This is an application I created to showcase different features of react and changes that can be implemented with State. This app allows users to filter the animal by the number of horns it has.

projects.title: Inventory Tracker
projects.description: A group project built using vanilla JavaScript, HTML, and pure CSS. This application was built to be used as a one click inventory restock platform.
